org.myrobotlab.codec.serial

Class CodecOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.myrobotlab.codec.serial.CodecOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CodecOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    a class which decodes bytes as an output stream, puts the decoded strings on a queue and relays the stream of bytes to another output stream if available another thread can wait on the blocking decode method for new decoded messages
    Author:
    GroG
